name: Sportspage Feeds
description: Real-time scores, schedules, and betting odds for US leagues.  Unbeatable value.  Documentation: https://sportspagefeeds.com/documentation

api_methods.name: Teams
api_methods.description: Returns a list of teams within a specified league, conference, or division.

parameters.name: league
parameters.description: A valid league code (i.e., NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL, NCAAF, or NCAAB)

parameters.name: conference
parameters.description: A conference within the specified league

parameters.name: division
parameters.description: A division within the specified conference
